title: Legal Assistant (Medical Records Retrieval/Claims Specialist)
job_overview:
Sweet James LLP is looking for a Legal Assistant:

Requirements:
1. Graduate of 4-yr course
2. STRICTLY has an experience working at least (1) one of the following:
- Personal Injury Law Firm 
- Healthcare Account (Law Firm related)
3. Legal assistant experience in a Personal Injury Law Firm is a REQUIREMENT
4. Has an experience working remotely (with own laptop/PC and fast & reliable internet connection)
5. Able to do multitasking and work at a fast pace
6. Open to work on a graveyard shift. Working hours: 8-5PM PST (11PM-8AM PH time)
7. STRICTLY no current online job/work (send your updated resume. If currently employed, please provide a proof of your last day of employment)
8. We are an on-cam (M365 Teams) policy while working and ActivTrak will be installed. This is required.

Important Note: 
-Indicate your previous employer, especially law firms (No company name will not be entertained)
-Upload a photo of your working space and a full-screenshot of speed test (https://www.speedtest.net/), has to be 100mbps and above.
-Attach your resume as a file. Resume links will not be entertained

If you agree with all the terms above, please send your UPDATED resume/cv to Upgrade to see actual info for a quick response. Interview hours are in PST time zone, expect to be scheduled in US time (3AM-7AM PH time)

PLEASE USE THE FOLLOWING IN THE EMAIL SUBJECT LINE: "LA Applicant from OnlineJobsPH"
